channel.title: Starter item help
channel.description: how could i edit the starter items so they only come once to the new players im using a source in which u get a bronze long sword and a wodden shield wen u log in. but the bad part is it comes every time u log in. how coudl i stop it so that it only comes to new accounts only once.

item.title: Starter item help

nope cant find it

Read full topic

item.title: Starter item help
item.dc:creator: @Coldbloodio Coldbloodio
item.description:
@Coldbloodio wrote:

Open your Player.java file and search for playerEquipment

//First newbie weapon/shield bakatool playerEquipment[playerHat]=2643; playerEquipment[playerCape]=1052; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=1731; playerEquipment[playerChest]=3058; playerEquipment[playerShield]=3840; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=3059; playerEquipment[playerHands]=775; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=1837; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=861;

Read full topic
